org.apache.hupa.server.handler.GetMessag:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.client.storage.HupaStora:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/hupa/trunk@905107 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
org.apache.hupa.client.activity.LoginAct:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/hupa/trunk@1573291 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
org.apache.hupa.server.handler.GetMessag:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.impl.RndPanel:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.Loading.Loadi:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

Changed login fields validation to the presenter, and removed login button disabling feature because onKeyUp is not fired by some mobile browsers.
Changed the way of how rowsPerPage was handled, so the paging box shows the real number of rows.
Fixed a bug in fetch messages handler, which made the all the call fail when a message was malformed.
Changes in PagingOption to use the same loading of the caller.
Re-factor of views to move styling stuff to css: IMAPMessageListView

- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.

Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.client.mvp.MessageSendVi:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.RndPanel.setW:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.server.handler.GetMessag:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically

- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.server.preferences.InIma:
Added an implementation for storing user preferences in IMAP messages, right now, only contacts are stored.
When the user sends a message emails are added automatically to the contacts list.
Added new configuration parameters: DefaultDraftsFolder, and SessionDebug (SMTP, IMAP debugging).
A lot of work in test part in order to easily modify GuiceModule to be able to change classes implementations and run integration tests.
A couple of minor fixes.

org.apache.hupa.client.ui.NavigationView:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

org.apache.hupa.server.handler.AbstractS:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.server.utils.TestUtils.c:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.Loading.Loadi:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.impl.MyRounde:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.



git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/hupa/trunk@891668 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
org.apache.hupa.server.utils.MessageUtil:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.client.ui.__OutlineCompo:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.RndPanel.add(:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.server.utils.RegexPatter:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.

org.apache.hupa.client.mvp.AppView.showM:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.RndPanel.addS:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.server.handler.GetMessag:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/hupa/trunk@885783 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
org.apache.hupa.client.ui.MessagesCellTa:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.impl.MyRounde:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.RndPanel.RndP:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.server.handler.AbstractS:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.widgets.editor.Toolbar.T:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

A couple of minor fixes.

Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.

etc, etc.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.impl.RndPanel:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.client.ui.MessageContent:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

org.apache.hupa.server.utils.TestUtils.c:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.server.utils.TestUtils.s:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.impl.RndPanel:
Many changes moving styling from code to css which make Hupa easier to customize.
- Hupa.css is loaded dinamically 
- re-factoring and classing of layouts in views: AppView is complete, other views need some work.
- Added a rounded-corner class which defers which technique to use (css or html wrapping) depending on the browser.
- Removed all resize-window handlers because panels are resized using css rules.
- Improved a little bit the design.
- Fixed some issues with fonts.
- Added a footer.

I've checked this changes in linux, windows and mac and it looks nice.

org.apache.hupa.widgets.ui.Loading.hide(:

- Added a footer.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/hupa/trunk@1522265 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
org.apache.hupa.shared.storage.AppCacheM:
Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.
Improved performance, and removed repeated calls.
Fixing a lot of issues which makes Hupa almost ready for production environments.
Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/hupa/trunk@1573291 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
org.apache.hupa.server.handler.AbstractS:
Fixed a bug in sending emails with attachments in client side because the uploader widget was not correctly reseted.
Fixed a bug in server side because attachment-registry was not multisession.
Forward and send actions handle correctly attachments now, but reply needs more work.
Fixed a bug in Demo-mode which produced unreacheable attachments in the sent-box.
Inline images are not shown in the attachment list.
Increased server test coverage.
Re-factoring: moved methods from handles to util classes, renamed classes, regexp, tests classes etc.
Rolled back in client side to use implementations instead of interfaces

A lot of work in test part in order to easily modify GuiceModule to be able to change classes implementations and run integration tests.
A couple of minor fixes.

Complete refactor of HUPA so as many pieces can be reusable.
Adding the ability to support multiple imap/smtp servers, and autodiscovering of server configuration.
Adding client side caching infra based on localStorage.

Now client is a separated module which produce a reusable jar artifact.
etc, etc.
